ef def extract_features(reviews):
        strong_features = []
        weak_features = []
        for review in reviews:
            if "but" in review:
                weak_features.append(review.split("but")[-1].strip())
            elif "and" in review:
                strong_features.append(review.split("and")[0].strip())
                weak_features.append(review.split("and")[1].strip())
            else:
                strong_features.append(review.strip())
        return strong_features, weak_features

strong_features, weak_features = extract_features(reviews)
```
